goals.active: Secure the largos' help to learn more about the krait orb.
goals.complete: Apatia and I tracked down Sayeh al 'Rajihd, the largos we'd been told about. Sayeh gave us a challenge to prove we were worth her time, which we met. She then told us what she knew about the orb. Its origins, purpose, and true power are still a mystery, but we did learn where it will be, so Apatia and I set out to claim it for the Pact.
